name: Downfall of heroes
description:
Harold and friends have a final adventure!

There is an option to enable cheats: Automaticaly win fights or automaticaly lose them. (Present as skills Harold has)

The fights are most likely terrible.

I made this game for the Harold Jam, uploaded it 1 minute before the deadline and Itch.io decided it had to many files

So... though I'm being allowed to "submit" it, it's already discualified. In any case, if you have time, I'd be very thankfull if you gave it a try.
